text: "Crazy Little Thing Called Love" is a 1979 song by Queen and is taken from their eighth studio album The Game (1980). It went to number 1 in Australia, Canada, the Netherlands and the United States, number 2 in Ireland, New Zealand and the United Kingdom, number 3 in Belgium and South Africa, number 5 in Switzerland, number 8 in Norway, number 9 in Austria and number 13 in Germany. It has been covered by Dwight Yoakam. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:Dwight Yoakam songs Category:Rockabilly songs
title: Crazy Little Thing Called Love
